resources.string: Space Stations EarthKAM Sees the Grand Canyon

On April 3, 2017, the student controlled EarthKAM camera aboard the International Space Station captured this photograph of a favorite target - the Grand Canyon - from low Earth orbit. The camera has been aboard the orbiting outpost since the first space station expedition began in November 2000 and supports approximately four missions annually. The purpose of writing more unrelated stuff is just to check if the scroll view is working properly or not and i want your help to allow me doing this and also it might help a little me to improve my typing as well. Lets see then if it worked or not. Lets keep finger cross and hope for the best. I am pretty sure it will work and make my nasa app wonderful. Lets check it out now. Enough writing.
